awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.

fullplot: A suburban Chicago teenager's parents leave on vacation, and he cuts loose. An unauthorised trip in his father's Porsche means a sudden need for lots of money, which he raises in a creative way.
plot: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.
title: Risky Business
